title: Copia e incolla su Google Drive
content:
Ciao a tutti

per lavoro utilizziamo la piattaforma di Google per gestire email e anche parecchi file su Drive. Dato che abbiamo un elenco cartelle molto corposo su Drive e che viene popolato direttamente dalle email chiedevo se c'era un modo qualunque anche tramite estensione di effettuare la banale operazione di copia e incolla tra una cartella e l'altra di Google Drive che so dalla cartella ABC spostare il contenuto alla cartella CLIENTE1 con un cut&paste. grazie a chi saprà aiutarmi ;-)
creator: giuliano8

title: Can't Edit Autofill Phone Number
content:
Firefox autofill saves my phone number with a +1.

In other words instead of saving my phone number as 555-555-5555 it saves it as +1555-555-555. Of course this is rejected by 99.999% of the forms on the web making this part of the autofill useless. So I go to edit it by removing the +1 and save. It appears to save fine but when I look at it the +1 is back again.

Why the stupidity and and why not let me edit it to whatever I want?
creator: whatatay

title: Updates
content: Why does Firefox update so often. I lose all of my trust settings every time it updates and it is really beginning to irritate me. I have to reset everything. If this cannot be sorted out I will move to another browser that doesn't make me waste so much time resetting everything on a weekly basis
creator: ian101

title: Your Directions for adding apps and other items does not match my version of Firefox
content: I have reloaded Mozilla Firefox again and now I'm totally confused. I had to do something, because your instructions on for instance Bookmarks suggest I click on the Toolbar button, but my version has not got one. Also I had to Download something called Filelink so I could send a Video by Email. Accept I can't find the link called "Preferences" that is in your instructions to make it work. Is your instruction schematics up to date or do I have to download another version or do I have to personalize my Website.

title: websites connection failure
content:
Hi Firefox Team, I am a university student, and I keep getting these messages below, especially when I am doing research for my assignments; it is painful as time is of the essence. I need your help asap. I have already cleared my cache, and cookies Thank you The connection was reset

The connection to the server was reset while the page was loading. 

   The site could be temporarily unavailable or too busy. Try again in a few moments.    If you are unable to load any pages, check your computer’s network connection.    If a firewall or proxy protects your computer or network, make sure that Firefox is permitted to access the web.

Alpha
